strings.Value: An armored wizard who had learnt to fight in heavy armor and attune his armor to his magical energies.
Trained in harsh environment to ensure that will last until worst had passed. +4 to max HP

Your exploration into the secret mysteries of the world have granted you a preternatural understanding of all things - and you just keep getting smarter. You gain a +1 inherent bonus to Intelligence upon taking this revelation and another at every third level gained thereafter
